short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Emulates a click on the next button in a survey. Default shortcut ALT-X (can be changed at Chrome extensions bottom right)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This small extension helps frequent survey participants / testers by adding a shortcut to going forward in the survey / form. Should work with most surveys - otherwise use the contact form and send a description or link to the survey.
